post.description: Login and set access token to header
Endpoint to allow a user to sign up with their details

get List cart item by access_token of user

put.description: add item to cart, return info of added item

post.description: Update cart item by delete all old cart items, then add received item to customer card
post.summary: update cart of customer by received cart item

delete.description: Delete cart item by product id of customer
delete.summary: delete card item of customer cart

get.description: Check out customer cart then delete invalid item(sold out item) return list of sold-out Items' ID
get.summary: Use to validate items of cart then modify it if invalid

put.description: New product quantity by size and color of product If the quantity of an existing one with the same size and color or not found product detail will throw error.
put.summary: init product quantity for product size and color

post.description: Increase the amount of a product by product_quantity_id

parameters.description: quantity_id represent for amount of product's size & color
parameters.name: request

parameters.description: quantity_id represent quantity of size & color & detail_id(product_id)
parameters.name: quantity_id

put.description: Create order by customer's. Will delete all items of customer's cart

parameters.description: index of first item, default is 0
parameters.name: off_set

parameters.description: max length of response, default is 10
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: a list of brand name separated by commas
parameters.name: brands

parameters.name: colors

parameters.description: a list of tag name ['HOT','NEW','SALE'] separated by commas
parameters.name: tags

parameters.name: genders

parameters.description: a list of type name separated by commas
